fields.description: It's also been suggested that we may want to offer APIs to cover common layout styles that may not be covered by our existing APIs (or a box model!) such as grid layouts to help developers achieve some standard layout patterns more easily.
fields.summary: CSS: Investigate layout patterns missing in our APIs
